sentences.sContent: We shall dress the hall up for the National Day.
sentences.sContent_eng: We shall dress the hall up for the National Day.
sentences.sCn: 我们要把大厅布置一新过国庆节。

sentences.sContent: I give you a special blessing to have it every minute per second gives you health， happiness and good luck and I hope that this is the best that you spend the National Day!
sentences.sContent_eng: I give you a special blessing to have it every minute per second gives you health， happiness and good luck and I hope that this is the best that you spend the National Day!
sentences.sCn: 给你我特别的祝福，愿它每分每秒都带给你健康、好运和幸福，希望这是你度过的最美好的国庆节! 愿这短短的话语给你带来国庆的快乐!

sentences.sContent: My friends and I went to the Fragrant Mount on National Day.
sentences.sContent_eng: My friends and I went to the Fragrant Mount on National Day.
sentences.sCn: 国庆节那天，我和我的朋友们一起去香山游玩。
